SEARCH
Package org.skriptlang.skript.common.function

Interface Parameter.Modifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
Parameter.Modifier.RangedModifier
Enclosing interface:
Parameter<T>
public static interface Parameter.Modifier
Represents a modifier that can be applied to a parameter when constructing one using DefaultFunction.Builder.parameter(String, Class, Modifier[]).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    Parameter.Modifier.RangedModifier<T extends Comparable<T>>
    Modifier specifying valid range bounds for numeric parameters.

    The modifier for parameters that support optional keyed expressions.
    static final Parameter.Modifier
    OPTIONAL
    The modifier for parameters that are optional.
    static final Parameter.Modifier
    RANGED
    A modifier to use for checking if a parameter is ranged.

    Parameter.Modifier.RangedModifier<T>
    ranged(T min, T max)
    Creates a range modifier with inclusive min and max bounds.

  • Field Details

    • OPTIONAL

      static final Parameter.Modifier OPTIONAL
      The modifier for parameters that are optional.

    • KEYED

      static final Parameter.Modifier KEYED
      The modifier for parameters that support optional keyed expressions.
      See Also:
      • KeyProviderExpression
      • KeyReceiverExpression

    • RANGED

      static final Parameter.Modifier RANGED
      A modifier to use for checking if a parameter is ranged. Do NOT use for declaring a parameter to be ranged, use ranged(Comparable, Comparable) Accessing the min and the max values can be done via Parameter.getModifier(Class).

  • Method Details

    • of

      static Parameter.Modifier of()
      Returns:
      A new Modifier instance to be used as a custom flag.

    • ranged

      static <T extends Comparable<T>> Parameter.Modifier.RangedModifier<T> ranged(T min, T max)
      Creates a range modifier with inclusive min and max bounds.
